You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY New Screen Flow" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).

Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_New_Screen_Flow
Type: Flow
Version: 2
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})
